trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja believes the gainery's buildings have seen better days.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Iq Br'aax)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Iq Br'aax)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Xd'aa Talat Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>Sorry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but I need you to make a trip to the upper forest. Are you up for it?
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_002<tab>Our gainery is the new face of Mamook, so I'd like it to be tidy and well-kept for all who come to visit.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_003<tab>With that said, I'd be grateful if you collected some Ut'ohmu natron from the vicinity of Iq Br'aax. It can be used as a cleaning agent.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_004<tab>With that said, I'd be grateful if you collected some concentrated Ut'ohmu plant oil from the vicinity of Iq Br'aax. It can be used as a cleaning agent.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>With that said, I'd be grateful if you collected an Ut'ohmu trout from Xd'aa Talat Tsoly. We can extract a decent polishing agent from it.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>Be sure to use golden stonefly nymphs as bait. We have some for sale here, in case you weren't aware.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_007<tab>I would be grateful if you collected some Ut'ohmu natron from around Iq Br'aax. We'll need it as a cleaning agent.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_008<tab>I would be grateful if you collected some concentrated Ut'ohmu plant oil from around Iq Br'aax. We'll need it as a cleaning agent.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_009<tab>I would be grateful if you caught an Ut'ohmu trout from Xd'aa Talat Tsoly. We can extract a decent polishing agent from it.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_010<tab>Be sure to bait your line with golden stonefly nymphs.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_012<tab>Perfect, exactly what I requested. Thank you.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_013<tab>You may have noticed during your venture, but the Xbr'aal people also use such cleaning agents in their daily lives.
TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_014<tab>The upper forest is far more exposed to the elements, which requires greater structural maintenance and upkeep.

TEXT_BANMAM112_05272_KAGEELJA_000_015<tab>So when I noticed our buildings needed some brushing up, I consulted our Xbr'aal neighbors. They were good enough to recommend some materials, and invited us to gather as much as we needed. If it's to keep this place presentable, I may well take them up on that offer again...
